name: cinematographically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or involves cinematography (= the art and methods of film photography): The director is known for her complex, cinematographically rich documentaries. The piece was a musical montage of songs and choruses that almost cinematographically depicted revolutionary events in Russia.
More examplesFewer examplesThe director himself described it as a realistic film which shows cinematographically what is "more true than truth".It seems safe to say that films that are cinematographically incompetent may also be incompetent in other ways.
